name: Entropy's Fall
storyline:
Entropy's Fall is an Action Adventure game and a love letter, from two brothers, to games like Shadow Of Colossus and God Of War but with a 2D twist. The game will focus heavily if not solely on Boss Battles against massive enemies. You’ll need skill and wits to find weaknesses of the Arafa(Bosses) and exploit them with Kayos’s(Protagonist) unique set of skills.     
The Game follows a man's deep personal journey of loss, revenge, duty and morality. The story revolves around abstract concepts of reality as the players explore the living planet of Entropy!
summary: Entropy's Fall is an Action Adventure game and a love letter, from two brothers, to games like Shadow Of Colossus and God Of War but with a 2D twist.
